Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed our stay”
Reviews.Author: djdg
Reviews.Content: Our family of four stayed at the Silver Palms, and while we found it a little tight overall it was comfortable. We really enjoyed the pool, and found the location convenient for our needs. The free breakfast was adequate, and all our other dining needs were met easily by restaurants within walking distance. We were happy with the experience.

Reviews.Title: “Average Stay”
Reviews.Author: TangledUpInChicago
Reviews.Content: We stayed seven nights and, overall, the hotel was fine and suited our needs. Staff: The staff was very friendly and accommodated anything we needed. While the staff was friendly, the cleaning staff was very inconsistent. Our room wasn't cleaned one day, we didnt get towels a few days, and things like facial tissue would not be replaced. Location: The hotel is centrally-located. Everything is within a 15-20 minute walk but nothing is within a five minute walk....so, if you want to be in the middle of the action, this is not your place. Pool: The pool is small and only 4' deep, but it was well kept. However, a major complaint is that the designated smoking section for the entire hotel is at the pool...this makes no sense--the only place you're allowed to smoke is around other hotel guests trying to relax with their families. Can't the smoking section be put in the garage or, better yet, not on the property at all? Smelling cigarettes while trying to play with my baby daughter was disgusting. Room: The room felt clean and, as a suite, was a great size to splurge for the week. The downside is the suites face the front of the building...so, we were constantly woke up by drunks getting out of cabs, motorcycles roaring down the road and a rooster that began cockle-doodle-dooing every morning around 4:30am and would continue for hours (no, that is not a joke).

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel Excellent Location”
Reviews.Author: Suzanne L
Reviews.Content: We were very pleased witheverything about our stay at the Silver Palms. It is within walking distance of many of the sights, the trolley and some great restaurants. The staff was great and let us park there before we were able to check in (we got to Key West in the lae morning). they offered us bottled water and gave us directions to places we wanted to go to. the rooms were very comfortable with a small private balcony (ours overlooked the pool). The bed was ver comfortable and the decore fresh and modern and energy effficient (have to leave the keycard in the slot to have the air conditioner run). Everything was very clean, continental breakfast was great and we could sit out by the pool to eat. Free parking too.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel, excellent location!”
Reviews.Author: gus1899
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel at the last minute when we decided to take a couple of days out of our vacation and go and see key west. I was a bit nervous but was very happy when we got to the hotel and saw the room. There are many really good features about this hotel. There is plenty of free parking on the hotel grounds. Which was very nice since the area around the hotel is crowded with little parking. Pretty much everything is within walking distance of the hotel. Duval street was about a 5 min walk, 15-20 min walk to mallory square and 10 min walk to the southern most point. It was close enough but also far enough away from the noise, crowds and roosters (yes for some reason many hotels on Duval street have roosters that crow at 6 am) of Duval street. The hotel was energy efficient which I thought was very nice. The rooms are very modern and even the rooms are energy efficient with many energy saving things in place. The rooms have there own private balconies. Very nice pool and free continental breakfast as well. I would defiantly stay here again and I would recommend this hotel to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: John D
Reviews.Content: We had an awesome time staying at the Silver Palms Inn! First and foremost, the staff is excellent! They are very attentive and beyond helpful. They made reservations for us, gave pinpoint directions and provided us with anything we needed at the drop of a hat. They are very polite and courteous and made you feel that no request was beyond their reach. The room was comfy and clean. We slept Great! The bed and pillows are just as comfortable as the ones we use at home. The water pressure in the shower is awesome. We loved the "Green" aspect concerning the lights and air conditioning. Though, it did take some getting used to putting your key card in to operate them. Brilliant idea! Let's save the planet! :) The pool and surrounding areas were very clean and there was adequate seating for all to catch some rays. The one slight negative was that the pool is on the small side and not very deep. (5ft.). Perfect for cooling off. The breakfast was continental style. Fruit, bagels, croissants, muffins, danishes, and the like. Perfect way to start your day on your way out the door to explore the island. If you are expecting more than that you will be disappointed. Finally, the Hotel is located a couple blocks from the noise of Duval street. All of the attractions are less than a 20 min walk away. If walking isn't your bag, the guys at the front desk will be happy to rent you a bicycle. We found the location of the Hotel perfect. One final thing....The wild Roosters that inhabit the Island may wake you on occasion. It's part of the island's charm. This did not bother me. However, my girlfriend did use the earplugs the hotel provides. They've thought of everything! Enjoy your stay! We will definitely be back!!!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Paul154998
Reviews.Content: We only spent 1 night, but we found the Silver Palms to have excelent rooms, large sparkling and almost new. A nice pool and continental breakfast were lovely and the staff was first rate. The best is the location, just a block or so off Duval, an easy 15 minute stroll to Mallory Square, lots of restaurants within minutes. The hotel can get you any type of amenitiy you wish includiung bikes, mopeds or tour deals. We would definitely return.

Reviews.Title: “Will be back”
Reviews.Author: Bernice R
Reviews.Content: This hotel went above and beyond any of our expectations. Our daughter and son-in-law decided to get married in Key West. We were referred to Silver Palms Inn by their wedding planners. GREAT CHOICE. The staff were so helpful. They answered all of our wedding guests questions. They also allowed us to use the pool area as our meeting place both before the wedding and even in the evenings when everyone got back from whatever they had planned for the day. I would recommend this hotel to anyone that is going to Key West. It's within walking distance to Duval and the bar scene. The rooms were great with comfy beds. The breakfast was better than some hotels in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Average hotel for high value”
Reviews.Author: lescol
Reviews.Content: I can add to others reviews that this hotel is new and clean. Breakfast included in price is an advantage until you try it: very low quality fruits, coffee and croissants, plastic cups - thats all, not so promissing, happy me I tryed this breakfast only once. I am from Europe so my comment can differ from U.S.citizents. The worsiest things are that the towels and bed linen are 100 years old in grey collor. I was thinking that somebody was sleeping in my bed before, brrr...really difficult to understand how hotel can save on this very important things...

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous hotel in a great location”
Reviews.Author: Eddie_Aberdeen
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel in a great location, easy to find and only a short walk to Duval St makes this an ideal hotel for a stay in Key West. Breakfast was continental buffet style but food was fresh and there was plenty of it. Staff were all very friendly, the pool area is nice with towels provided in your room. Parking is very good and we were allowed to leave our car there after check out, not sure if this would be possible in high season but it was a nice touch to be able to walk back into town for a couple of hours then be off on our way back to the mainland without the hassle of finding somewhere to park.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Place to stay in Key West.”
Reviews.Author: Altmans
Reviews.Content: This was our second visit to the Silver Palms Inn. We were there last year soon after they opened and couldn't wait to get back this year. Its a perfect location within walking distance to everything. The rooms are beautiful, clean and the beds are extremely comfortable. I slept much better than at home. The staff are extremely friendly. Eva, Erin and the man that checked me in (who checked me in last year) are wonderful. The breakfast is a perfect start to a fun day in Key West. The pastries especially are wonderful. The pool is very nice. Parking is provided on site and is a real asset since you don't have to search for a spot. The sound of the famous Key West chickens in the morning lulls you to sleep longer as you listen to their wonderful calls. After many years of changing hotels each year, we finally found a place we expect to come to year after year for many years to come.

Reviews.Title: “It is beautiful.”
Reviews.Author: kapcat
Reviews.Content: Although Silver Palms is expensive, it is a beautiful hotel. It is new. The employees are wonderful. It is very clean, and the decor is beautiful. It is quiet, but one can walk to Duval if one is a walker. Cabs are also available as well as the trolley. Parking is very convenient. The fitness equipment is excellent. It is smoke free including the balconies. However, the pool area is not smoke free, and it was a problem for us. People were smoking by the door leading to the pool. South Florida appears to attract smokers.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place”
Reviews.Author: labonte66
Reviews.Content: First time staying at this Inn but it will not be our last! Very well decorated, nice small pool area and a great staff. Easy walking distance to Duvall St. where all the fun begins!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel!!”
Reviews.Author: MommyRed
Reviews.Content: Loved this hotel, room was spacious and clean. Loved that they included breakfast and parking unlike many other hotel I looked at in this price range. Also loved that they included coupons for restaurants (just ask). Perfect distance from the bars and entertainment, about 3 blocks, close enough to walk to everything, but far enough away that is quiet when you want to sleep. Staff was friendly and helpful, although didn't have much interaction with housekeeping, we choose to straighten and clean our own room and didn't have the sheets changed. There were not a ton if frills in this hotel but we weren't expecting them. Bottom line I would stay here again if I go back to Key West!!!

Reviews.Title: “great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: ghthd86
Reviews.Content: silver palms was a great place to stay. central to old town key west so we could walk to everything we wanted. service was great. the breakfast was fresh with good choices. room was clean and comfortable. staff was great. will stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Sorry, Silver Palms is NOT a 4* hotel”
Reviews.Author: PhiloFarnsworth
Reviews.Content: The rooms are very nice, but there is no hot tub, the pool closes at sunset, no restaurant or bar, views of the parking lot from every room. Breakfast ala comfort inn. No room service. etc. Good location and nice rooms, but no frills.

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Denali National Park and Preserve, Alaska
Reviews.Title: “Nice rooms, nice people, poor policies, services, and amenities”
Reviews.Author: trilobite01
Reviews.Content: The rooms were very nice, and probably some of the nicest in Key West. However, this is not a resort. Why on earth are they charging and additional "Resort Fee"? There is nothing about it that makes it a resort. First of all, the breakfast ends at 9:00, very early for a vacation destination. And trust me, the staff are yanking the food away from you at 9:01 am. The pool closes at 6:00 PM!! Are you serious? 6PM, WTF? It's a "resort", right? Wrong. It's a nice pool, but I didn't get to use it. Crazy. They have good parking though. Doubt I would go back unless they change some of the way they view their property.

Reviews.Title: “Please Go Elsewhere”
Reviews.Author: frank l
Reviews.Content: Let me start by saying that this hotel is more like an upgraded (slightly) Motel 6. The pictures of the grounds and rooms are VERY misleading! Room (although we only stayed for about an hour before deciding on another hotel) seemed clean but small. Our balcony overlooked the parking lot (not what I look for in a vacation) and a SMALL pool. The hotel (MOTEL) offers no real services or amenities, and the staff, if you can find them, is basically useless. We explained our situation (that we weren't happy with the hotel and would be leaving immediately) and were told that the MANAGER (from all of the other bad reviews, you'll figure out that the MANAGER is NEVER to be found when there is an issue to deal with) is the person who we can discuss or refund with. We moved on and decided to deal with this when we got back home. BIG MISTAKE!!!! We did contact Book-It.com (during our vacation) who scheduled or trip, and they never called back. Now, two weeks later we're finding out that the Hotel (MOTEL) wants to charge us for the entire FIVE NIGHTS WE BOOKED because they said we smoked in the room. WE DIDN'T!!!! But, even if we did YOU'RE CHARGING FOR FIVE NIGHTS??????? There policy, by the way, is to tack on a $100. cleaning fee if, in fact, you do smoke in the room. ARE YOU KIDDING ME? WHAT A RIPOFF!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “A gem”
Reviews.Author: fred1931
Reviews.Content: this hotel is a little gem convenient location, good parking and clean very nice rooms. staff helpful. breakfast could be better, all bagels etc and not well laid out. Still would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent, modern rooms”
Reviews.Author: alexjharper
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Silver Palm in early Jan 2012. The rooms are superb - very modern, everything you could wish. Good pool area with comfortable loungers. Breakfast was good with enough choice and plenty to eat! Staff were very helpful. I borrowed a laptop a few times. Re location, its not perfect, but its close enough to where you want to be. Strongly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome hotel”
Reviews.Author: CAA817
Reviews.Content: Beautiful and very clean rooms. The staff are very helpful and nice. We normally stay at B & B's in Key West and decided to try something different and loved our stay. We will definetly be back

Reviews.Title: “Best place to stay in Key West”
Reviews.Author: gypsy1684
Reviews.Content: This is the place to stay . It is "in" key west but not old and not right in the midst of noisy partying, etc. but still close enough. The hotel was perfect - the rooms had everything you need and were pristine and quiet! Our room seemed to be rather European style, where the space is well designed and utilised. Although, the breakfast was very limited ( no hot foods) it had great croissants, pastries and fruit and was free! Parking was also free ( a huge plus in Key West) Peter was at the front desk when we checked in and he was very welcoming. I almost didn't choose this hotel because I thought the photos on line were not very attractive - they show a very contemporary, hard, looking decor...when in fact it was very comfortable, There are 2 elevators ( unfortunately one of them malfunctioned while we were there ,and repairs were not done by the time we left) Cons: I do wish they had a hot tub ;also the pool could be heated & stay open till 10pm. ( not sunset) We did not ask for any "service" so I really can't answer that .

Reviews.Title: “Really excellent hotel in Key West”
Reviews.Author: Ann-Lie
Reviews.Content: Pro's: very nice, new and nicely decorated hotel rooms extremely clean and spacious very good, free wifi signal Duval street and other Key West attractions all in easy walking distance Free and safe parking Small but nice swimming pool Good breakfast as far from choice (and complementary) Very adequate, fast and helpfull front desk staff, offering immediately some bottles of water upon arrival Cons: Nothing really except the following thing: They have this eco thing they put quite some noise about (although this kind of system you find in Europe in 80% of the hotels) but the breakfast they serve on plastic throw away things. If they really want to be eco they use things that can we washed and used again the next morning. If we come to Key West again, we definately would stay in this hotel again!! We had a 14 days trip in Florida, personally this was the best hotel we had during this trip.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Better Price, Brand New Property”
Reviews.Author: A_Heart_For_MB
Reviews.Content: I've stayed here twice and it was exactly what I needed. The property is just a short walk to Duval, See their live camera here: www.seekeywestlive.com/webcams/1 to check out their location. The hotel is not only brand new but they went really high tech. No loud air conditioners or anything really to worry about. The beds are heavenly, the rooms pristine, and the main attraction which is the pool area, is stunning! My wife and I slept like babies, relaxed like the elderly, and partied like rock stars during our stay. There are a few room categories including a huge suite so make sure to book the room that fits your needs. There's also a few "Local Favorite" restaurants just 1 or 2 blocks away. (Some of the best food on the island). The staff is very helpful and pleasant. You will see at least one of the owners on property at all times which I think helps keep everything looking/feeling perfect. This is not a resort so if you are looking for room service everyday and a butler, this is not the property for you however they do offer lovely VIP services if you need something for a special occasion. All in all I love this hotel. It's on the quieter end of Duval which can be great if you don't want to walk out of your door into a gaggle of drunkards! I think the location really provides guests a local feel because you are surrounded by a neighborhood where tons of locals live. The bars and restaurants that are directly around Silver Palms are all local hot spots.

Reviews.Title: “New hotel close to Old Key West”
Reviews.Author: cgulley
Reviews.Content: The hotel is new and clean, the room was spacious and the bed was comfortable. No more than a 20 minute walk to most places you want to see on the island. The continental breakfast was better than expected. I would have given it 5 stars but the hotel was missing one thing; a hot tub. The pool water was cold, end of October, so a nice relaxing dip in a hot tub would have really been nice. other than that, this place is nice, no complaints.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, clean place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Queeniekel
Reviews.Content: This hotel is a quiet spot within three or four blocks of Duval Street. The property is very clean and in good condition - everything still looks new. Plenty of free parking. The pool is small, and for chilly nights, a hot tub would have been a nice option... especially since there aren't bath tubs in the guest rooms. The only real complaint was that the pillows at this hotel are terrible. My husband said it felt like they were stuffed with wads of kleenex or cotton balls. They were thin, lumpy and small... So we both ended up with sore necks and backs. We asked for firmer pillows, and all they did was provide us with two more of the same broken-down pillows. We did like the fact that this property is trying to be Eco-friendly. Staff was friendly. Breakfast left a lot to be desired.

Reviews.Title: “Silver Palms 10 day stay”
Reviews.Author: Craig M
Reviews.Content: We just spent 10 days at the Silver Palms. Love it. We found the positive recommendations on Trip Advisor to be accurate. The place is exceptionally clean thanks to a hard working, ample staff. The staff is very courteous and helpful. No problem getting extra hangers, restaurant suggestions, renting bicycles, maps, room cleaned, printing out boarding passes, etc. The Wi-Fi signal very strong and band width adequate most times. The pool area is great with very nice lounges, chairs/tables, and a couple of cabanas. We enjoy swimming, the pool is smallish but adequate and clean. Many days we ate breakfast at the pool and/or had cocktails there at night. The breakfast offered three types of cereals, three types of fresh fruit, many types croissants, bagels, Danish, etc. plus of course ample fresh coffee, tea, milk and juices. We found it very convenient to walk many restaurants. We were particularly pleased to find that it is about a 20 minute walk (and shorter bike ride) to the marina boardwalk which we enjoyed. The rooms are spacious and comfortable. The smallish washroom wasnâ€™t a problem. Shower great. The rooms are not sound proof. You can hear the traffic on Truman and the roosters. The hotel supplies each room with ear plugs. We are sensitive to noise but didnâ€™t feel the need to use the ear plugs. Truman doesnâ€™t have much traffic in the morning but the roosters will wake you up. Noise from other rooms was not a problem. Each room has a â€œbalconyâ€�. Only a few over look the pool, the rest donâ€™t have much of a view. We just used the pool area when we want to sit out in the fresh air. We have no problem recommending the Silver Palms to our family and friends.

Reviews.Title: “Coming back soon”
Reviews.Author: KYApril
Reviews.Content: I would recommend Silver Palms for anyone who visits Key West. The hotel is beautiful with new furniture, dazzling tile shower, and even a small balcony overlooking Truman St. If you're a light sleeper, you should ask for a room off the street side, as the traffic was noisy - and the chickens do not respect quiet time! The hotel has several features to make it environmentally-friendly. You use the key card to turn on the electricity in the room, the a/c shuts off if the balcony door is left open, etc. I booked a jr king suite. It had a sliding room divider that could be used for privacy between the living room area and the bedroom. There were two nice televisions in the room- one for the bedroom, one for the living room. The provided shampoo, conditioner, and lotion could have been better quality for the price of the room, but were sufficient.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, well-located boutique hotel in Key West”
Reviews.Author: slandau6
Reviews.Content: We stayed here the week between Christmas and New Year's and really enjoyed it. A few short blocks from Duval Street (but with none of the attendant noise), the Silver Palms was a relatively quiet oasis for two people seeking relaxation. I say relatively quiet because, as with many locations in Key West, it's plagued with wild roosters, who screech for a good portion of the night and morning. But that's not the hotel's fault. The beds are among the most comfortable hotel beds we've had in recent memory, and the Silver Palms offers a very serviceable continental breakfast, which you can eat in the lobby-adjacent dining area or poolside. Staff were friendly and helpful too. Overall, a good find in Key West!

Reviews.Title: “As good as last year.”
Reviews.Author: freddiemd
Reviews.Content: Second time we stay here with our cycling friends and the place is as clean, convenient and friendly as last time.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place”
Reviews.Author: Krishti P
Reviews.Content: A wonderful place that is just walking distance from the main street, Duval. The staff was friendly and very helpful. The rooms are beautifully decorated and housekeeping does a very good job. I couldn't have asked for anything more and I will definitely go back.

Reviews.Title: “A great laid back Key West hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Bill78727
Reviews.Content: We had a long weekend in Key West and stayed at the Silver Palms Inn and were very pleased with the small boutique hotel. The rooms were fresh, clean and like new. Plenty of AC, hot water and service. The front desk was helpful and arranged our taxi etc and made the trip worthwhile. A reasonable value and much cheaper than some of the other similiar hotels that we looked at. Everything we needed was in walking distance of this centrally located hotel. Will definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: NomadChamberlin
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here for a long weekend and we were EXTREMELY PLEASED with our stay. The rooms are very modern and comfortable. The location was perfect, it was just a short walk to Duval Street and all of the action. The staff was extremely helpful with directions and making restaurant and tour reservations. In the morning we were pleasantly surprised by the continental breakfast with its fresh baked croissants, they were DELICIOUS! I couldn't find anything wrong with this hotel and would recommend it everyone looking to come to Key West. Can't wait to go back!

Reviews.Title: “Really nice”
Reviews.Author: C G
Reviews.Content: After we (2ad +child) stayed one night we extend for one more night. So we had a double queen bed room and the suite, which were both really nice. The hotel seams very new with a fresh design, nice pool, free parking and is absolutely clean. Only the breakfast could be better to keep up with the whole picture.

Reviews.Title: “RIP OFF SCAM ARTIST BUYER BEWARE”
Reviews.Author: Bill C
Reviews.Content: We found them like most of you through one of the many websites for Key West, when I tried to find out if they were members of the Chamber of Commerce or BBB and they werenâ€™t that should have been my warning flag! We booked 4 nights at $359 per night for the Fantasy Fest Special Rate- Our room was adequate, many of the pictures are taken at deceiving angles to give a larger appearance we were on vacation and willing to over look this, right before we left for vacation we checked and found they were running a special for the last night we were there at $99 a $260 SAVINGS!!! We were told we would receive it and our security deposit back upon check out! Over a month later now in December and I am still trying to get my money back. Breakfast bar was lack luster at best, walls extremely thin, ants everywhere, and constant issues with AC system, over all a very poor way to try and get repeat customers!!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, shame the bed linen was not fresh”
Reviews.Author: HarryHornet09
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel in a great location. Unfortunately when, after a nice evening out dinning, we decided it was time for bed, the bed sheets were old... In fairness they gave us another room at 23.00 but thought on checkout we would have had an apology and maybe a reduction. Nice place, would I go back, no. Poor customer service by the owners.

Reviews.Title: “New Years 2011”
Reviews.Author: Chris R
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Silver Palms with another couple last New Years. It was very clean and nicely remodeled. We shared a 2 queen bed room with another couple and had plenty of room, there was plenty of closet space, a little sitting area and a balcony overlooking Truman. The bathroom was perfect for sharing, the sinks are located in an alcove in the main area and the toilet/shower are separated with a door so we could all co-exist with no conflicts. The pool area was always clean, the breakfast had all the essentials you need for a "morning after" wandering around Duval. It is a bit of a hike from the main action on Duval but that's not the hotel's fault.

Reviews.Title: “Good value”
Reviews.Author: Jenper1
Reviews.Content: This hotel is a great value. It's only 4 blocks from Duval and all the things happening there. The room was clean & bright. Beautiful shutters on the windows and even a small patio. Free parking was great as well. We spent our honeymoon there and really enjoyed it.

Reviews.Title: “Neat, clean, comfortable bed and friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: CTNan
Reviews.Content: We found this hotel through the tourist information bureau in Key West. They got us a lovely room for less money than any of the discount places on the web. There is underground parking, free internet and phone, a small pool and breakfast included. Our Jr. Suite turned out to be on the main road and noisy - a local rooster and traffic at all hours. They are moving us to a smaller room - no couch and second TV - but two queen beds that will be quieter today. Breakfast was excellent - best croissants that I have had in a very long time. Would recommend this hotel in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: capemaydonna
Reviews.Content: This was a girlfriend get away. We found The Silver Palms on the Key West website. We loved that it was "green". We were only going to spend four days in KW but after we arrived we decided to stay the whole week. Our room was comfortable and quiet. Very clean. The location was perfect for what we wanted to do. This hotel is perfect for a quiet stay just far enough away from Duvel St. We rented bikes and never had to move our car (free parking is a huge bonus). The pool was lovely but a little cold. Breakfast each morning was just enough. Everyone we dealt with was very nice and accomadating.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: BarryRolfe
Reviews.Content: New clean hotel in great location for getting to the main attractions of Key West. Room large and only drawback was lack of storage space particularly in the bathroom. Staff helpful and friendly. Good free breakfast. Car parking an asset.

Reviews.Title: “Super nice!”
Reviews.Author: JerryKenosha
Reviews.Content: My wife and I drove down from Orlando to hang out in Key West for a day and stayed over night at this great place. It was great to have parking. It seemed almost brand new with really neat "green" features built into the room. The lights turned off when leaving, etc. It had a nice pool and friendly staff. We were able to walk to most things, which is great.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay, Pretty Room”
Reviews.Author: Cindy A
Reviews.Content: My mom and I stayed in one of their pool view, 2 Queen rooms on the third floor. The rooms are beautiful...very tastefully done. The beds are very comfortable and everything is very clean. They also have this green thing going, so you have to put your key in the light switch to turn on the electricity in the room. Overall, I was very happy with the room, the staff and the location. The only complaint I would have is that there is very little storage in the room. The dresser only had 3 drawers and the bathroom counter was very small. The counter is outside of the bathroom itself, so there is no storage in the bathroom.

Reviews.Title: “Staff of special help”
Reviews.Author: tpbf
Reviews.Content: A simple, straightforward sort of hotel designed in a tropical style. One complaint was that "pool view", for which you paid more, was viewed across the parking lot. A few blocks (about 5) away from downtown which was a help with Key West noise. There are no daily papers available, but a 24 hour drugstore just up the street sells everything you could imagine. Pool gets nice morning sun, a help for the tanners wanting to get an early start. On this trip (Oct., 2011) they had not turned the heat in the pool on so it was a tad chilly. As an older woman travelling alone I often had questions and the staff was great - even offering alternatives for getting around. A great several day stay.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Rebecca P
Reviews.Content: The Silver Palms Inn is in a great location. It's within walking distance to all the major tourist spots in Key West, but it's not on a very noisy street. The staff was very attentive and kind. The rooms are very clean and I love the "green" aspect of the hotel. The only downside of our trip was that it was raining the whole time but that has nothing to do with the Silver Palms Inn! I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone going to Key West!

Reviews.Title: “This Wonderful Place Called To Inform Me I had Left My Diamond Ring In The Room!!”
Reviews.Author: ceejaymac
Reviews.Content: All of these reviews are accurate. The accommodations are clean, roomy and modern. There is a safe, refrigerator and microwave in each room which helps to cut down on costs for munchies and those late night snacks when you're too tired to walk up the block. The pool is clean and the continental breakfast is plentiful. I prefer to bring my own sheets, but theirs are adequate. Above and beyond ALL OF THAT (and trust me, that's a lot in Key West where some hotels will charge you for parking, breakfast, and even a guest fee if you bring a friend over to the pool for a couple of hours) two days after I had returned home (and had yet to unpack my jewelry case) an employee from Silver Palms called to inform me that the cleaning staff had found a diamond ring in our room. I had only worn it one night and must have knocked it off the night stand during the evening. I hadn't even missed it yet and they were on the phone informing me of a local shipping company (Pakmail) who would pick it up and send it to my home for $20.00. We travel to Key West a lot and I can tell you that there are plenty of places that would not have thought twice about pocketing that ring. I am indebted to them and will refer everyone I know to stay at their facility! Think about this, if this place is willing to go above and beyond for a guest who has already checked out, just imagine what they will do for you while you are staying there? Enough said.

Reviews.Title: “Best Experience!”
Reviews.Author: jen0214
Reviews.Content: I found this hotel online in a package deal, and was pleasantly surprised. The staff at Silver Palms Inn were very nice and accommadating. The location was a few blocks from Duval, but the walk was nice. It is very quiet, and everything is kept very clean. I LOVED the decor of the rooms! Very modern and interesting. They went "green" on conserving energy, so that was impressive! All in all, this Inn will be my recommendation and MY choice from now on in Key West! Great Job!

Reviews.Title: “Great spot and value”
Reviews.Author: Ticatfan
Reviews.Content: Rooms are beautiful, very modern and everything is brand new. The location is great as well, 3 blocks from Duval street - however, a bit of a treck to Mallory Square (30 mins) The pool is also nice, you don't even realize it's in the middle of the parking lot continental breakfast, free parking and free wifi is nice as well The only negative was there was a resort fee which I was not made aware of, $10.75/day Overall, I don't think you can beat this place for value in Key West

Reviews.Title: “Best value and comfort in key west!”
Reviews.Author: gypsyrunaway
Reviews.Content: This hotel was recommended to us by the friendly folks at the garden inn, as they were booked. Couldn't have asked for a better deal! first, its inexpensive, $110 a night. Its newer than most places down there so absolutely no moldy smells, all Kohler fixtures (nice!), contemporary clean and green design! extremely friendly service from all staff, plus free parking which is nice because everywhere in key west you have to pay for parking with meters, pay lots, or pay machines. Its a good 6 or so blocks from duvall st and Mallory square. would definitely stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “Unexpectedly wonderful”
Reviews.Author: Levonti
Reviews.Content: Didn't know what to expect, but relied on the positive reviews on TripAdvisor and would agree with every one of them. Free breakfast, free parking, free WIFI. Great location very close to Duval street. Very accommodating staff. Nice pool area. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: “Probably the best value in Key West”
Reviews.Author: mantleuk
Reviews.Content: Very clean and well appointed "motel like" property in the best location on Key West. They do not have a restaurant (as such) but there are plenty of eating places within walking distance - parking is free, a rare find on Key West.

Reviews.Title: “I bit expensive compared to the value”
Reviews.Author: AlexJacobsen
Reviews.Content: Good decent hotel which has an ok location: you can walk to Hemmingway's house, the light house and the southernmost point. If you want to go to Mallory sq, you will have to drive. The hotel is in the "upper motel category" but charges as a 3 star hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Ideal location and very friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: PAPUFFOTTI
Reviews.Content: We spent a week there last August - centrally located (just a 5' walk from Duval street), makes it very easy to walk out for dinner (no need to grab taxis..). If you rent a bicycle (at least two rentals 2 minutes away across the street), you're the king of the island :) and easily reach Fort Zachary beach (the best in KW) or any other nice location on the island. Breakfast at the hotel is fine, fresh compimentary lemonade available throughout the day (blessed when it's so hot!!), nice pool with plenty of room. We had a spaciuos room facing the pool - clean, quiet and with a nice balcony. Friendly and very helpful staff. I'd surely go back again!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent choice”
Reviews.Author: viatahermosa
Reviews.Content: This is a very modern hotel, with very clean, updated, functional rooms. At a walking distance from all the fun, but quiet enough if you want to rest. Very convenient indoor parking and continental breakfast to get you going in the mornings.

Reviews.Title: “If you like a hot room, this is your place!”
Reviews.Author: Tommiet57
Reviews.Content: Eco friendly place that shuts off your air conditioning when you leave the room. So if you like to come back to a nice and hot room, this is your place. Service is fair at best. First and last stay....

Reviews.Title: “Wish I could've stayed longer...”
Reviews.Author: Megt114
Reviews.Content: You know how you see pictures online of hotels and you make your final decision based on them and then you get there and realize they're a WHOLE and captured the ONLY nice thing about themselves just to reel you in? This is NOT the case with the SPI. It is BEAUTIFUL. It was SO clean. You could eat off the floors. I have never been at a friendlier/more helpful hotel in my life. The staff did everything from giving us supplies we forgot, to making reservations for excursions to holding our bags and calling taxis. They were so helpful and nice. The rooms were immaculate and SO modern. They are very eco-friendly and even though I don't consider myself very eco-conscious, I really enjoyed all of their initiatives. They had separate towels for the pool and for the bathroom. (this is a pet peeve of mine with other hotels). The bed was so comfortable. The pool was perfect, the continental breakfast was yummy. The hotel is further from Duval street than I thought it would be, but there are plenty of bikes/mopeds you can rent to make the walk easier. The heat was pretty intense, but it's my own fault for going in July. I would DEFINITELY come back. We had an AMAZING time! Thank you SPI!

Reviews.Title: “They got it right”
Reviews.Author: techiebug
Reviews.Content: Recently stayed here for a couple of nights after diving. They advertised that this was newly renovated and green space. They got it right! We were not interested in any sunset views here...which is something you won't get. We wanted something where we could be away from the noise of Duval street, yet could walk there and back to the hotel and feel safe. It worked out great. The hotel is great. You place your key in a spot to have the lights, electricity activated. The room was clean. The breakfast included pastries from Croissants de France on Duval street. AWESOME. There was information about sightseeing activities at the check in desk. The pool looked inviting, although we did not have time to enjoy it, this time. Will definitely chose this hotel again for next year's lobsterfest!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent small hotel in the Keys”
Reviews.Author: SwedishDiver
Reviews.Content: Excellent service, very tasteful interior deisgn and nice hotel rooms, perfect size if you're just two. Free parking, free internet and a really nice pool although to get a 5 pointer from me it has to have a deep end at least 9 feet. Really professional staff especially in the lobby. Breakfast was better than most hotels that offer contintental menues. If I ever go back to the Keys this hotel is definetley on my list! It's located on a Truman ave and everything is within walking distance. PS: There are roosters everywhere and they sing "scream" pretty loud in the mornings (real early too..)

Reviews.Title: “Best one so far!”
Reviews.Author: VancouverLeigh
Reviews.Content: I've been to Key West half a dozen times since February and I have stayed in a different hotel each time. Silver Palms Inn was the best of the bunch! Fresh, clean, pleasant room, great staff, easy walk to Duval. Highly recommend it! You will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible, non flexible service”
Reviews.Author: tc258
Reviews.Content: Service is bad. We asked 30 mins additional late check out. They said 15. Disappointed since the check out time was early at 11a. No flexibility.

Reviews.Title: “Cool, small spot.”
Reviews.Author: SteveO23
Reviews.Content: Great value here. Awesome, small rooms- very modern. Easy, free parking and quick check-in. Place was very clean and offered a decent spread of breakfast for free: muffins, cereal and such. This was our first trip to the Key and for us this was a nice location. 3 blocks of nearly the center of Duvall, so close enough but quiet as well. Pool size was only disappointment, but loved the small size and quickness of this place- free park, 2 minute check in, and 5 minute stroll to the fun. Great 1st stop- much better than the huge resort we stayed at for more money where waiting for elevators, and check-in , and walking to rooms took too long. It's better to waste money than time in Key West.

Reviews.Title: “we like it.”
Reviews.Author: jenthe
Reviews.Content: My family and I like it, but price is kind of expensive, the breakfast has only bagels and muffins, no egg or no waffles. Location is great, we walked to the shopping and restaurant area. But the "Beach" is dirty, can't swim, smell.

Reviews.Title: “Nothing but the best”
Reviews.Author: worldtraveler10954
Reviews.Content: Centrally located brand new hotel in Key West. Room was neat and clean, as well all the common areas.. Close to restaurants and tourist attractions. Highly recommended.This hotel was much better than expected. Front desk, House Keeping staff was courteous and nice. We hardly spent our time at hotel as every thing was stone's throw away and we were out all the time.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, Modern”
Reviews.Author: camlovestotravel
Reviews.Content: Nothing really special but modern style. It nice place to stay for two days while visiting the keys. Elevator was broken and room was on 3rd floor that was a bummer. WiFi had issues but front desk sent an IT person right to our room to fix (ended up giving us a cable to hook up to).

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Hotel with Great Service”
Reviews.Author: southerntlc
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at the Silver Palms Inn for a long weekend. We chose to stay there due to the bargain price. From start to finish, the stay was very pleasant. Check-In was quick and Peter was very personable and helpful. Even though there is a "resort" fee of $10, it was worth it for the off the street parking and bottle of water. The room was very clean and modern. Our room was on the third floor and very quiet (except for the roosters but that is part of Key West's charm!) The bed was comfortable and it was nice to have a refrigerator to store cold drinks, etc. The in room safe is large enough for laptops which is a rarity but very welcome. The only thing about the room was a slight smell of sulfer that was prevalent in the bathroom from the large drain in the floor. I'm assuming the drain had to do with the beach / sand / drainage (?). The smell was not terrible though and easily ignored. In terms of service, we had forgotten to print an electronic ticket for our trip to the Dry Tortugas and the front desk was kind enough to print it for us. We did not partake of the complimentary breakfast but it seemed to be busy and well attended. The pool -- while small -- was lovely. Location is great....a small walk from Duval Street and all the action as well as some yummy restaurants. The Silver Palms Inn is somewhere we would definitely stay again on our next journey to Key West.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay! had a great time”
Reviews.Author: eyecon82
Reviews.Content: This hotel was much better than I expected. Front desk staff was courteous and nice. I even got a chance to speak with the owner who was very pleasant and helpful. She even gave us a discount for no reason. Overall, I am definitively coming back to this hotel next time I visit the white sand beaches of key West

Reviews.Title: “Perfect place for family vacation”
Reviews.Author: Simonsen
Reviews.Content: We booked this for 3 days on the hotels website and got a Junior King suite - perfect for us...Room is fairly large, 2 flatscreen TV's, the shower and toilet are separate from the sink, which I personally like, as I can brush my teeth even though somebody else is using the toilet. The pool area is very nice and they play music from hidden speakers... Breakfast is complimentary...juice, coffee, 2 kinds of cereal along with oatmeal, muffins, bagels - well, it is what we like to eat for breakfast... The hotel is also very close to both the south beach in Key West as well as downtown/old town so it is easy to get to where "the action is". Oh, only negative thing - we have a great bed for us, parents - but our kids, age 14 and 11 have a sleeper couch...I probably should have chosen the room with 2 queen beds, as the sleeper couch, though new, the mattress is pretty bad and their first night was pretty bad...I haven't complained about it as that's just the way sleeper couches are.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Great Location, Great Service”
Reviews.Author: AmrishDesai22
Reviews.Content: perfectly located hotel for anyone staying in Key West. Rooms are neat and clean, as are all the common areas. Great pool to cool off in. Close to restaurants and tourist attractions. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Love this place :-)”
Reviews.Author: Cynthia1947
Reviews.Content: .This place was great...Very clean,close to town and sights...great pool area. Staff very friendly with wonderfully delicious pastries in the morning. Highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, fresh, new, lovely Hotel:)”
Reviews.Author: HeartSummer
Reviews.Content: Our room was great! Large, clean, fresh, lovely decor! The room included a microwave and fridge to our surprise! lovely shower with beautiful tiles! The pool area was rather small however was perfectly adequate. The staff were friendly. The complimentary breakfast was anything to rave about however was adequate considering it was complimentary. The hotel's in a pretty good location. We hired a car to get around as we were continuing our vacation to miami, we found a car park at mallory square near the shipwreck museum. Struggled to find parking elsewhere. I would recommend this hotel to anyone, reasonably priced, clean, modern and spacious:)))

Reviews.Title: “My husband and I enjoyed our stay at Silver Palms Inn.”
Reviews.Author: doreen1439
Reviews.Content: I was not that happy with they gym the hotel had. There was one treadmill, one step master, and one bike. That was it. I was expecting more equipment, like weights for the upper body and machines for the lower body. My husband and I enjoyed the location of the hotel though, just minutes away from Duval street, but at night we were able to enjoy quiet time (didn't hear noise from the stre) and the room service was excellent!

Reviews.Title: “we loved the Silver palm Inn. Very nice resot Service was excelent.”
Reviews.Author: daksha1601
Reviews.Content: Excelent staff. excelent service. Neat and clen all the areas.Staff were very friendly.I had a very nice experience.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay, very clean!”
Reviews.Author: uvlsalsmn
Reviews.Content: Had a wonderful stay with another couple. My wife and I actually said "Wow" when we walked into our room. Of course, after reading the bad reviews from the 3 gals that posted we checked to make sure nothing was broken. Everything was in good order so I guess it must have been an isolated incident. Great location to Duval street. Only negative I would say is that we had to go to front desk for extra towels but they were more than happy to bring a toilet plunger when we phoned down.. Go figure, but our whole stay was great and the front deal people were extremely nice to deal with!

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: teeDoan
Reviews.Content: The Silver Palms Inn was a very nice and clean place for us to stay. It was located a few blocks away from Duval St., so it was close enough to all the activities, but also far enough away from the action to give you a quiet night's sleep. The room was spotless, comfortable and spacious. It felt like a little Caribbean getaway. The pool was small, but clean, and the loungers were comfortable and clean. The hotel breakfast was nothing special - mostly pastries, fruits, juices, and cereal - but a nice added bonus. Overall, a very nice stay for its price point.

Reviews.Title: “Front desk staff were great”
Reviews.Author: Lewy8
Reviews.Content: We stayed here over the 4th of July weekend, and when we arrived, after a 4 hour airport delay, and not until 1:30 am, we were greeted warmly, and helped promptly. I cannot say I had any bad experience here. The pool was very nice, our room was very spacious, the beds were comfortable, and the room service was good. Actually, our pillows in the second room were too flat for my preference, but the first room we stayed in they were fluffy and perfect. Pieter, at the front desk, was super! We ended up staying an additional night at Silver Palms, as he offered us a great deal on a single bed room, if we stayed. We appreciated all their hospitality, but especially Pieter who helped us extend our stay, and took care of us when we checked-out making sure anything he could do to help, we received. Free wireless internet and breakfast were both included, but we didn't have the breakfast. It's only 6:30 am to 9:30 am...it just ended too early for this trip. It's location is several blocks off Duval, but by no means too far when walking! Just a nice way to see things away from Duval, Front St. & Whitehead...we found new restaurants on that side, we've never been to before. Very glad we stayed there this time.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful new hotel”
Reviews.Author: DRobbins57
Reviews.Content: First time to stay at the Sliver Palms Inn and was not at all disappointed. Is a long walk to Duval St. but the hotel itself is only about 6 months old and rates are great. i did NOT experience any of the bad review situations on this place, in fact, just the opposite. The staff made every effort to accomodate whatever needs we had from calling taxis to recommending places. A shorter walk would be great to the center hub of things but taxi fare within Old Town KW is so cheap it is worth a few bucks to save the tired legs and feet after an all day walk. Also scooter rentals are only $35 for all day so definitely try this out. The Inn is spacious in room size, we booked a 2 Queen bed room and it was perfect. We only requested maid service for one day in a week stay and housekeeping was worried that we weren't being taken care of. (Now where else would you get that service??) But we just wanted privacy and didn't mind our bed not being made etc. Anytime we needed towels etc. they were more than happy to provide clean ones. The Inn offers a light breakfast of pastries, muffins, juices, coffee, every morning which was nice and filling. You can take to your room or eat at the pool. The ONLY con I would have is that they provide more than one ice machine for each floor which from where we were located was a distance away from the room. Other than that I will stay again when I go back to the Keys. They made our trip great.

Reviews.Title: “This is our new "go to" hotel in Key West!”
Reviews.Author: msmayhem
Reviews.Content: Silver Palms is exactly what you see on their website, beautiful! We stayed 2 nights and really enjoyed our stay. The rooms are good sized, clean & very comfortable bedding. Our room over looked the pool, which we actually made time to enjoy! My husband & I came to really just relax and enjoy quiet time. Most of the guests that we met at the pool seemed to be doing the same. A few reviews were negative regarding the distance to other areas we just walked to wherever we were going to end up for the evening and called a cab to get back, only $5 bucks at the most, less then most drinks. We have always stayed at another hotel in Key West and will now just use that one as our "backup". Our only complaint was that we left for breakfast early came back to relax by the pool and the maid never came to the room even though she saw us leave when she was outside the room next door. We were able to get clean towel later from another maid. The breakfast was your typical toast, cereal, danish etc. can't comment on quality as we didn't try it.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel in okay location. Great value compared to other hotels.”
Reviews.Author: zbidwell
Reviews.Content: On a family trip to Florida we decided to drive down to Key West one day and drive back the next day, so we stayed at Silver Palms Inn for one night. I booked this hotel thinking that it would be in a great location central to Key West attractions, shopping, and eating. It is in a central location, however, it seemed a bit distant from main places like Mallory Square, the southernmost point, and Duval Street. We walked to all of those places from the hotel so it certainly is possible if you are okay with walking. The hotel also offers free breakfast, free parking, internet, and a pool. Those amenities aren't necessarily found (or aren't free) at many of the other hotels throughout Key West. The rooms at Silver Palms are very nice and very spacious for the price. Everything throughout the property was clean. If I were returning to Key West, I would certainly consider the Silver Palms Inn again. I would have to consider the extra price of amenities if I stayed at another location in the city.

Reviews.Title: “Joke of a hotel”
Reviews.Author: Kaykay789
Reviews.Content: Please never stay at this hotel if your looking for a nice relaxing vacation it sucks and the staff is a complete joke, they are rude and charge for a little make up stain on a wash cloth.... Exactly I was my face with it obviously it's going to get make up on it. I will never stay at this hotel again for the simple fact that the manager was never there to speak to and no help was ever offered I felt taken advantage of what a joke... Do yourself a favor and book at anothe place anywhere!!!

Reviews.Title: “Bad Business”
Reviews.Author: KtripsNY
Reviews.Content: I was scheduled for a nice long weekend trip to Key West from New York the last week of January. Unfortunately, there was a major snow storm with over 19" of snow the day before I was flying out. My flight was not until the following evening so I was confident that the snow would have ended by then and that my flight would leave. I did not know until the morning of my flight, that the airline I was flying with went ahead and cancelled all flights departing that day. I was devastated and beyond disappointed. I received a message from the airline at 10:30am that my 6:15pm flight was cancelled. As soon as I knew, I called to cancel all my reservations. Hotwire immediately verified the airline cancellation and issued me a refund for my car reservation- I highly recommend them. I was flying into Fort Lauderdale and staying there over night then driving to Key West in the morning. I called the Silver Palms Inn to inform them about my situation. The manager stated that she was aware of the severe weather and snowstorm because it was all over the news but it was "too bad" for me because they required 48 hours for a cancellation and I was only giving them 24. I tried to reason with her and explain that this was an act of nature and that there was no way humanly possible for me to make it over there. I would have rather beeen in a warm sunny place than snowed in but she would not budge. I was not even offered a credit for a future stay. I would have gladly taken that but she (Hansa) proceeded to charge me $312 for the first night regardless of the situation. I was disgusted and disappointed in how I was treated. I could understand if it was my negligence that placed me in the situation I was in but it was completely out of my control. I just wanted to make you aware of the bad business practices of this hotel. I find it appalling that a business would take advantage of someone under these circumstances to turn a profit.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Boutique style hotel with a Great Location!”
Reviews.Author: eam0132
Reviews.Content: Great location right on Truman, few blocks walk to Duval but yet surprisingly quiet and private. We arrived early morning, way before check in and the attendant allowed us to park so we could start our day. If you haven't been to Key West before, parking can be an issue so this was a pleasant surprise. Nice room, very clean. We've stayed in other Key West hotels in the past but this was the first time we extended our stay by a night, mostly because of the accomodations. We will definitely stay again next year.

Reviews.Title: “What a Lucky Find”
Reviews.Author: italy98
Reviews.Content: We were approaching Key West for the first time prior to Memorial Day weekend with no reservations. We stopped at what we thought was the tourist bureau, but think it was really just a sales office. We still got lucky and the awesome girl who's name I can't remember suggested letting her help us get a room in town based on our needs. It turned out to be legit. She got a better rate for us then we could have ourselves and yes parking was included. The gentlemen who checked us in was from Siberia and couldn't have been more helpful or pleasant. The property appears to have recently been redone with a great European feel. It has the electric slot near the door to insert your room key that way when you leave you don't leave on unnecessary lights. Beds were very comfortable with great pillows and nice bedding. You could really sink into it. The T. V was great and placed on a wall that doesn't back to another room. Maybe that's why I didn't hear my neighbors T.V.--how nice. The toiletries were fun and classy and the shower over sized which was nice. We had a small balcony on our room. The included breakfast was simple but enough to get you off and started. The walk to town and most attractions was fine just a bit long but you really didn't notice that till having been in town all day and returning at night when you were past tired. Definitely hope to return. We had no extra charges or unpleasant staff. I have worked in customer service for 23 years so my expectations are high and they exceeded all.

Reviews.Title: “Solid Hotel, no complaints..”
Reviews.Author: lookingglass101
Reviews.Content: I stayed here two nights with adult family members. Pros: Clean Room Nice Pool (small but nice, all the chairs were normally filled) Free parking Mini Fridge/Room Safe Rooms were decent size, some with balconies (however, mine over looked a parking lot) Location: Was about a 10-15 min walk to the heart of Duval St. I liked being away from everything, so it was mostly calm (only a few times were people loud in the hotel) Free breakfast till 9:30 but below average food New hotel Cons: Staff was obviously not that interested in being friendly. Overall for the right price I would stay here again. It was nice enough, clean and relaxing. I would suggest this to friends.

Reviews.Title: “Bad Experience”
Reviews.Author: MNWDC
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel with 2 friends and upon arriving we noticed that the screen on the digital thermostat was broken. We could still push the arrow up or down to adjust the temperature in the room so we didn't want to make a big deal about it and never gave it another thought. Then as we were checking out we were bombarded by management who said we had to pay over $100 for the broken thermostat. We tried to politely explain that it was broken when we arrived but were given the "oh well" attitude and were told we should have immediately notified the staff of anything broken upon arriving. The management was incredibly rude and would not back down. My friend now has to dispute the charges with her credit card company. Also, on the last morning there I woke up with bites all over my arms and legs that were in the typical line pattern indicative of bed bugs. So I am now having to suffer with multiple bed bug bites that itch like crazy, while also worrying and hoping I didnt bring them home to my own bed. This was not a good experience and I do not recommend staying at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice and would definitely return”
Reviews.Author: cookie4611
Reviews.Content: A new hotel, very clean and rooms were a good size. A little pricey. Booked online and though I knew there was a resort charge it was not listed on the bill. We were charged a resort fee when we signed in. We have stayed at resorts before and this is not a resort. Be a little more upfront with your charges, I had no problem with it but I'm sure other people might. The breakfast in the morning is the typical donuts,pastry and bagels although the coffee was surprisingly great!! Other than the extra fee, we enjoyed ourselves and would definitely return.

Reviews.Title: “CHOOSE ANOTHER HOTEL!!! DO NOT STAY HERE OR YOU WILL PAY ..LITERALLY!”
Reviews.Author: Cnels8
Reviews.Content: I was appauled by how the staff mistreated my friends and I. They tried to charge us for every single thing that was used in the hotel room (towels, bed sheets, etc.) They even claimed there was another person in our room and intended to charge us for an extra night. When we went to the front desk to ask about all of these mysterious charges ($300 worth), there wasnt even a manager on duty to speak with us. They continued to accuse us of all the things we didnt do and told us there was "no way around the charges but the manager would be there the next morning." We tried as hard as possible to enjoy ourselves for the rest of the evening, but it was difficult trying to budget our spending money thinking a $300 chunk has been ripped from us. We then had to base our next morning around hoping the 'manager' could finally grace us with their presence. Once he did, he continued to blame us for staining sheets that he claimed were washed and the stains would not come out. I then asked him for OUR sheets since we were charged for them and they were now our property. He said he did not have the sheet but would check with house keeping. HE DIDNT HAVE THE SHEET BECAUSE THEY REMADE OUR BED WITH THE 'STAINED' SHEET THAT WAS STILL IN OUR ROOM. I would like to know how they washed the 'stained' sheet when they never even reemoved it from our room. He finally agreed that if we can remove the stains they would not charge us, just before assuring us "they use top of the line appliances and can assure us the stain will not come out of their bedsheets imported from China." We then took MORE time out of our vacation to waste MORE money to bring to the cleaners, which is conveniently right next door...? The cleaners giggled to themselves when we explained the situation. They told us they deal with the same situations from the hotel guests regularly and assured us they could get it out. Who wouldve thought........ if you wash something, it DOES come out! Shocking....I know. They refunded only some of our money when they were proved wrong about the so called stains. This apparently lazy and completely unprofessional and rude staff not only wasted plenty of our time and money but more importantly almost ruined our ENTIRE vacation which they did not acknowledge what so ever, not even after proved wrong about their sheets. I spoke with a few other of the younger vacationers at the hotel who experienced similar situations with the staff. It almost seems as though they seek out tthe youngsters to take advantage of and assume they are easy targets. I also find it hilarious that the hotels guest relations manager can fnally make the time to come out of the wood work to reply to the negative comments on this website, but was NO WHERE to be found on multiple occasions when they were actually needed by guests at the hotel. Do yourself a favor and just avoid this mess before it happens and stay somewhere else. I wouldnt waste my time writing this lengthy review for nothing. Stay somewhere where you can have fun without feeling like youre being watched and doing something wrong.

Reviews.Title: “very clean. new decor. good location.”
Reviews.Author: zachariah18
Reviews.Content: this hotel is as advertised. nicely decorated rooms, very clean, nice staff. would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “4 star amenities at a 3 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: Goober818
Reviews.Content: This is a very modern, well cared for property with an attentive staff and excellent amenities including free coffee, tea and lemonade throughout the day. Location is good, a three block walk to Duval St. Provide daily continental breakfast to guests, free parking and no resort fees. Bedding and bed are fair and rooms are noisy (they provide earplugs in the basket with shampoo).

Reviews.Title: “GREAT PLACE TO STAY!”
Reviews.Author: NYPDFinest
Reviews.Content: this hotel was great from the moment we arrived, to the tine we left, on arrival the room was not ready we got there at 10:30 am check in is at 3:00 pm, Peter helped us at the front desk he was very nice, he had the room ready for us in 20 minutes, it was very clean! we sat by the pool while we waited. the parking lot is near the pool but you would never know, because the pool area is so nice your not looking at the parking lot, and a wall is high enough for you not to notice,. the hotel is 3 blocks away from Duval we walked every day/night very safe they also have a CVS, Papa Johns, and a subway on the same st. 1 block away. our room was 203, it was on Truman, Truman is a busy st, it is the main drag other then Duval, you have lots of traffic, but i'm a city girl i didnt mind, i felt at home :) the rooster on the other hand lol was a pain in the butt, but that has nothing to do with the hotel. the breakfast they serve is great, muffins, bagels, cereal, juice and coffee, and they leave out fresh made lemon aid, that was amazing its great when ur tanning by the pool to run in for a cup :) they also had slippers for you in the room that were very comfy, and robes i did not use the robe. Key West is a mixed crowed of people no one judged the other, in KW its One Human Family...

Reviews.Title: “very nice!”
Reviews.Author: ccwhitwam
Reviews.Content: Check in to unpacking very easy. Room wasn't large but set up very nice. Quality materials used in construction and decor of room. Quiet area. Stayed Dec 26-27 of 2010. Unfortunatly coldest Dec on record for the keys :( We did not use but pool area was very nice as well. Leave your car at hotel. We walked from hotel, end to end of duval and back. Highly recommend Southern most beach Cafe for dinner or lunch plans.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Hotel for our Group - will be back!”
Reviews.Author: keymom
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for a very quick KW trip - just one night. The rooms were large and bright. Pool are was really enticing. We walked to Duval a couple of times...not too long for us. Breakfast was an added bonus. Would definitely stay here again, especially if we bring the kids.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hotel..great service”
Reviews.Author: rosielou2
Reviews.Content: Stayed there last weekend. Wonderful decor..super clean..friendly staff..beautiful pool.. very close to Duvall Street yet it was very quiet and peaceful.. Great place to stay. we will be back there. Great..great bed..an d I have a bad back and it was very comfortable

Reviews.Title: “Nice place!!”
Reviews.Author: lakebrain
Reviews.Content: Nice inn, pool, rooms clean and great to have mini fridge . Did have problem with small ants in our room, staff moved us right away. Would try to get a room away from main road, noise factor for us. Walked or rode a bike everywhere!

Reviews.Title: “What a find, close to the action but not to close.”
Reviews.Author: orangeallin
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed 2 nights, this hotel is very clean, beautiful rooms, frige, micro, balcony, pool with lots of seating. Will make this our hotel while in the Keys, continential breakfast was good and fresh and plenty for everyone.

Reviews.Title: “EXCELLENT, EXCELLENT, EXCELLENT!”
Reviews.Author: ptlami06
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were in Key West for a few days last month. We came by the Silver Palms Inn hotel because it was close to the areas we needed to go. Shopping, the beach (of course) and other attractions we were also walking distance, which was great! The front desk was very helpful in guiding us to the relaxing/fun things to do in the area also. The big surprise though was when we got in our room! My goodness it was BEAUTIFUL! All the appliances and furniture in the room were brand new! They designed the rooms very well, with a high quality modern look. The rooms look exactly as they do in the pictures on their website - exactly as seen and described. The beds were also soft and very comfortable. You could definitely tell the place was just built with everything new and clean! The hotel also serves free breakfast in the morning and has free Wi-Fi, microwave, hair dryer, etc. ; everything you need to spend a few days outside your home. They also had a fitness center which was very nice, especially if you like to go to the gym regularly. Daily house keeping did a great job cleaning our linens and bathroom regularly. What I liked most about the facility was that given it was brand new, and it was VERY CLEAN. I felt as if I was staying in a high rise hotel in NewYork City with the amenities and quality of room they had. The hotel was also well priced especially with everything they offered and their location.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: whulfc86
Reviews.Content: We found this hotel after driving around for an hour, we weren't disappointed. Very clean and nice large rooms. Pool was excellent. Service was good and helpful. Only problem for us is they didn't have a crib for our 14 month old as they didn't have any left.

Reviews.Title: “Classy, comfortable hotel in Historic Key West”
Reviews.Author: BarbaraLeary
Reviews.Content: This was my first trip to Key West with my 21 year old daughter. I had researched hotels there and found this gem in the Historic area, within walking distance of all of the attractions. The staff was friendly and helpful, even checking the weather reports as we headed out for a walk on our first afternoon there. The hotel is very tastefully decorated, the rooms and beds clean and comfortable. We would definitely choose this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: staceylee5
Reviews.Content: I cannot wait to actually stay at this hotel on leisure... Great location within walking distance to dining and shopping. The room is absolutly beautiful and the beds are very comfortable. The property itself with the pool area has a resort feel.

Reviews.Title: “trÃ¨s bon hÃ´tel”
Reviews.Author: tomy82
Reviews.Content: Hotel closed to Duval Street, the main street with all the bars and shops. The hotel looked very new, the room was very spacious and clean, well furnished with Italian bathroom and a little balcony on the pool side. Breakfast was good and the pool nice (even though a little smaller than it looks on the pictures). And last but not least the hotel has a free parking.

Reviews.Title: “Will stay again and recommend to the friends”
Reviews.Author: NEEYORK1976
Reviews.Content: We go to Key West every year and have stayed at many guest houses and also the resorts.We found the Silver Palms Inn and decided to stay there during this trip. What an amazing place! Beautiful spacious rooms, very good breakfast, nice size balcony, beautiful pool area and amazing service.The location is great, three blocks to down town and five blocks to the beach. We loved the place and will go back again and again!!

Reviews.Title: “We Will See You Again in 2012 - Silver Palms!!”
Reviews.Author: etrain33
Reviews.Content: My girlfriend and I stayed at the Silver Palms Inn (SPI) from March 25 to March 29. Overall our trip and experience at SPI was amazing, we will stay here again. The location to Duval, the cleanliness of the hotel, the staff, the pool and housekeepingâ€¦ALL AMAZING! We honestly have no complaints. The hotel is very modern and clean. The pool receives all day sunlight which is rare for a key west hotel unless you are with one of the large chain hotels, we used the pool every day. Only criticism of the pool, donâ€™t be afraid to turn the music up a little bit more SPIâ€¦it is difficult to hear over the sound of the waterfall. We rented bikes and found that was the best way to see key west, as compared to scooters or walking. SPI has places to lock your bikes in the evening which was nice. Donâ€™t worry about the roostersâ€¦by the end of day three, you will not even know they are there at 5AM. Be sure not to miss: Sandyâ€™s CafÃ© at 1026 White Street for Breakfast and/or Lunch. Amazing authentic Cuban cuisine. Seven Fish at 632 Olivia Street (less than three blocks from Silver Palms Inn) for dinner. The best food on the island. Call days ahead for reservations.

Reviews.Title: “LOVE Silver Palms Inn”
Reviews.Author: NorthWhiteGreat1
Reviews.Content: First time in Key West and we stayed at the Silver Palms Inn. This is a very nice and clean hotel, easy walk to Duval and great pool with awesome rooms. My only complaints would be our room view of the laundry mat, lol!!!! We really didn't mind as we were not in the room long enough to worry about it. Also if you want breakfast get there by 9:30am as the lady starts cleaning it up and by 9:45am it is all put away.......Enjoy your Duval Crawl!!

Reviews.Title: “What a new hidden Gem!”
Reviews.Author: llychornblower
Reviews.Content: I go to Key West every year with my girlfriends and have stayed at MANY hotels, timeshares and resorts down there. We don't rent a car, we walk EVERYWHERE.....thus......the Silver Palms Inn has raced to the top of our list of "places to stay" while in Key West. First and foremost, the rate was very reasonable to the average traveler and totally fabulous for us, because we are very familiar with the competition and their rates during March. I can't say enough about the prime location (just two blocks off of Duval), the BEAUTIFUL rooms, LOVED the bedding! Loved the cleanliness and "GREEN" concept. The housekeepers worked their butt's off keeping up with the messy spring breakers....man...I hope someone besides us left them a good tip. God bless the housekeeping staff! Speaking of spring breakers, the staff handled the groups well and we lucked out being on the other side of the property. All in all the kids were well-behaved and fun to watch when we weren't sunning on the most fabulous lawn chairs on the island! A fabulous continental breakfast was ready for us every morning served by the lovely Miss Erin. She knew I loved my morning milk! Peter and Vitale always aimed to please and were soooo kind and courteous! I was able to use a complimentary laptop in the lobby and they printed out my boarding passes for me as well. Can't say enough about our deck! So tough to get a beautiful room with a deck! If you've never been to Key West, you don't know the dumps you can end up in , even at the most expensive resort on the island who has a beach, but the crappiest rooms for the premium price you pay. So my friends.....If you want to experience Key West at an affordable, plush but cozy property......Silver Palms is the place to be. The pool is in the sun ALL DAY....It is sooooo clean....so friendly.......and remember....location, location, location! I can't say enough good thing about the Silver Palms Inn. Thank you to all of the staff who made our stay fabulous and affordable!

Reviews.Title: “Location is everything, because you can't sleep anywhere in Key West.”
Reviews.Author: DigitalErin
Reviews.Content: We paid an average price for a room in Key West and got a brand new, clean, spacious place with a good location and free parking. Just a few blocks from the shops, bars, and marina of Duval Street, on a main thoroughfare, it was not the quietest place available, but as a heavy sleeper I thought it was a great deal. My traveling companion wanted to commit multiple rooster-cide at 5am, but those things are all over Key West. There is a drop-off laundromat on the corner where I got a week's worth of stuff washed and folded for about $7. A couple of things I think could be improved are the confusing arrangement of light switches and the lack of screens, which forced us to use the air conditioning. We were also treated to a black-out, because I guess someone unplugged the cord in Miami; and a fire-alarm, which was just growing pains for the hotel. But none of these things would deter me from staying again at the same price.

Reviews.Title: “Spacious modern hotel with great rooms.”
Reviews.Author: ffemedia
Reviews.Content: The Silver Palms is relatively new to Key West. We appreciated that very much. The rooms look very modern and brand new. The hotel has its own parking lot with lots of spots in the shade. The pool are is quite nice. The choice for breakfast is sufficient - you get different beverages, fresh fruit, yoghurt, cereals, bagels, muffins etc. I would definitely come again. Only downside is the price. We got our room fÃ¼r 199 $, which already was a discounted rate. Than again: it's Key West...

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Contemporary, and Best Value on Key West”
Reviews.Author: 319expat
Reviews.Content: My friends and I were looking for a reasonably priced place to spend two nights in Key West (reasonably priced being relative for Key West). Not only did Silver Palms offer one of the better values, but it was near a fabulous Cuban restaurant that the front desk recommended. The modern decor was refreshing. The beds were comfy. The wifi was fast and reliable. A very nice shower. The pool area, though small, was still very relaxing with comfy lounge furniture. The fridge was very handy (there's a CVS nearby to stock up on beverages). Quiet area (at least our room was not on the street side). The breakfast selection was typical, but the pastries were much better than usual hotel breakfast fare. If you want a place on the beach or on Duval or a huge poolside area, this is not the place for you. But this is where I want to stay when I come back.

Reviews.Title: “Great Mother/Daughter getaway!!”
Reviews.Author: Connie076
